description:
"nova-manage log" doesn't work.

a) It assumes everything gets logged to the same file: /var/log/nova.log
b) Its use of utils.execute was never converted to the proper execve style calling.

If we cant fix it by release, I say we rip it out. Clearly no-one is using it anyway.
title: nova-manage log broken in several ways

comments.content:
"nova-manage log" doesn't work.

a) It assumes everything gets logged to the same file: /var/log/nova.log
b) Its use of utils.execute was never converted to the proper execve style calling.

If we cant fix it by release, I say we rip it out. Clearly no-one is using it anyway.
